extendedInfo.description: PLEASE DON'T UPDATE IF CURRENT VERSION WORKS FINE ON YOUR PHONE!THE MEDIA FILES ARE LOCATION IN sdcard/CLSOFTWAREThis spy camera is not just a camera; it can also record audio and video.  The most important feature is that is can run in BACKGROUND, as if nothing happens in your phone. You can twitter, browse Facebook, sending text message or email; you can even make phone call while it is working. So maybe it is the most excellent hidden camera you ever see. This application will not make any sound if you install another free app http://market.android.com/details?id=com.clsoftware.mute when take picture, and record video.IF YOU GET ANY QUESTIONS OR SUGGESTIONS PLEASE SEND EMAIL TO ME: clsoftware@outlook.comIf you want to buy the full version, please visit https://market.android.com/details?id=com.clsoftware.spycameraFeatures:1.You have to set a password before first time to use. This protects it from unauthorized usage from others.2.When you started taking picture, recording audio and video, you can back to home screen, the app will run in background.3.You have to input your password when you launch the app again from home screen.4.You can use from camera (if available) to take picture or record video.5.You can set number of pictures it take each time to start, after reached the specific number, it will stop automatically in background.6.You can set number of minutes recording, after reached the specific number of minutes, it will stop automatically in background.7.You set supported mode, scene, resolution etc. by camera.8.All generated media files will prevent from scanning.9.It will make no sound after install free app http://market.android.com/details?id=com.clsoftware.muteLimitation of Lite version:1.Only 10 pictures or 5 minutes recording of video or audio each time.2. Ads.TAGS:silent camera, mute camera, background camera, background audio record, background video record, spy camera, spy audio record.

reviews.title: Works Excellent on Galaxy Nexus!!! :)
reviews.comment: Awesome app!! This is the first time I\'ve rated and app, but I just thought the other reviews were unfair!! It says where your media files go, in the description. Just download a file manager if unsure how to access them. And down grade picture quality in settings if it keeps crashing, I think it\'s set for full hd at start up, so might want to change that if your camera is poor quality, and to save some storage space :)
reviews.author: Gavin Rae

reviews.title: Not Working on Micromax A110
reviews.comment: I installed the app & stared on my Micromax A110.  I tried video recording for first time. It said that Media File checking & so on......it may take some. Phone Hangs & restarts. Tried same thing again but phone restarted again.   I uninstalled the App.
